vakarySlogan: Vakary, plan your vacations as you please!

modal.download: Download our application directly to try it out.
modal.scan: Scan the QR code with your mobile device to download the application.

landingPage.free: We organize your dream vacations for you, for free
landingPage.pref: Tell us your preferences, the city you wish to visit, and we will propose a customized itinerary for you
landingPage.mobile: With Vakary mobile, you can also follow your itinerary in real-time and much more!
landingPage.enjoy: Make the most out of your vacations!
landingPage.enjoy2: Whether you prefer a walk, monuments, restaurants, or anything else, we have what you need
landingPage.enjoy3: Whether you are more of a fan of strolls, visiting monuments, tasting local dishes or other activities, we have the personalized itinerary that will suit you best.
landingPage.block3Text1: Vakary goes on an adventure with you!
landingPage.block3Text2: Vakary travels everywhere with you, thanks to our mobile app, you can follow your itinerary in real-time and geolocate. You can also find your friends with whom your itinerary is shared
landingPage.block3Text2b: Vakary is a powerful travel tool that allows you to create personalized itineraries based on your interests and schedule. With our mobile app, you can follow your itinerary in real-time, discover exciting tourist sites, and share your travels with your friends and family.
landingPage.block3Text4: With our group feature, you can share your itineraries, track the location of your group members, and chat with them

card1.title: TRAVEL WITH YOUR GROUP
card1.description: With Vakary's group feature, share your travel experience with loved ones for unforgettable memories.

card2.title: CREATE A PROFILE
card2.description: Share your desires, interests and introduce yourself to share your love of travel with the Vakary community.

card3.title: DISCOVER FRANCE
card3.description: No matter your preferences, Vakary offers a tailored itinerary to discover the most beautiful places in France!

forgetPage.title: Reset your password
forgetPage.link: Enter your Email and we will send you a link to reset your password:
forgetPage.code: Enter the code received by email:

itineraryModal.startingDate: What's the starting date of your itinerary ?
itineraryModal.howManyPeople: How many people will come with you ?

screenSizePage.ScreenSizeTooSmall: Sorry the Screen size of your device is too small, please use one of our mobile application :
